::Galaxor/Lavatron::

A shot hits Galaxor's armor, but the gestalt doesn't flinch. He fires
two more missiles, running at Abominus.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Lavatron stumbles back from the grenade, which left his armor charred
and dented on his chest plate. He growls, firing two bolts at
Surgital's chest, and then one at the shoulder of the arm that had
Explobody.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "dcoburn" <1641coburn@h...> wrote:
> OOC: Oh, and guys, I'm assuming we get one post with Abominus before
going on to the next person's turn, so if I'm right, rAuq posts with
Abominus next?
> ::Abominus/Surgital::
> 
>      Abominus was hit in the side by two missiles, then turned and
was hit in the left side of his chest by plasma blasts.  Abominus
growled, then fired 1 blast from his gun at Galaxor, then 1 at Groove
and 1 at Scattershot.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
>      Surgital stepped back away from Lavatron.  He was getting mad. 
Surgital "aimed" his elbow at Lavatron, then, the arm being Explobody,
fired a grenade from his elbow.
